37.eng-name: The Book of Clothes and Adornment

hadiths.text: Abdullah b. 'Amr b. al-As reported:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saw me wearing two clothes dyed in saffron. whereupon he said: These are the clothes (usually worn by) the non-believers, so do not wear them

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ لُبْسِ الرَّجُلِ الثَّوْبَ الْمُعَصْفَرَ،
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of A Man Wearing A Garment Dyed With Safflower
